person.persName: James G. Arnold (Kenton County, Ky, merchant)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, merchant. Paris, Kentucky native. Son of Elisha Arnold. Married to Margaret Strain Dalton Arnold in Maysville, Kentucky, in 1816. Father of Thomas Arnold, Mariana Arnold, Margaret Arnold, James Arnold, Pugh Arnold. Teacher in Mason County. Established Washington Male Academy in Mason County. Merchant in Covington in 1818. Counselor at Law in Covington in 1850. Owned three enslaved person in Covington in 1850. Resident in Covington in 1860. Employed Ellen Phelps, Hannah Tooney, and Patrick Haggarty in Covington in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Covington in 1860.
